body.name: Keslom Small USB Charger Spy Camera Home WiFi Security Camera Wireless Baby Monito Surveillance Hidden Camera Motion Detection Remote View
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 36 mins
features: 【Smart Camera 】 This is an upgraded 2-in-1 smart charger, which can meet your charging or shooting needs. Not only can it charge your portable devices ( Android/ iOS ), but also can record continuous video at the same time for safety.

【1080P FHD Image & Wide Angle】 This camera is equipped with 1920*1080 megapixels and wide 90° degree angle lens, which presents more details and produces clear image quality. You can also customize the timestamp in the video and choose whether to display the time or change the current recording time. This nanny camera offers a wider viewing angle and completely covers your room with no blind spots.

【Motion Detection & Continuous Recording】 This home wifi cameras have built-in motion sensor, when motion is detected, the camera will automatically start recording, alert notifications will be sent to your phone;this mode will save more space on the memory card (note: the sensing distance is within 3 meters).This wireless camera also supports 24/7 loop recording all the time.

【LONG DISTANCE WIFI CAMERA】- being able to view and control your wifi camera from your smartphone or mobile device means that you don't have to be sitting in front of a computer to see what is happening in your home or at your business. You can view the action while having lunch, from your car or anywhere you are!

【EASY TO USE AND SET UP】- No complicated wiring and network connection settings, our wireless cameras only need a power outlet to start recording. When there is no wifi, just insert the sd card (not included) the camera can still work.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 14 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera is cool. Very discreet. Looks and functions like a USB wall plug. I like to have cameras not only for home security, but to see what my pups are doing when we aren't home. It's kind of weird though having company over and there's these big bulky cameras everywhere (lol), so this is perfect. Video quality is good and the app that accompanies it is user friendly. I like that it has the option to record on internal memory and comes with the plug and everything else you need to download whatever videos you want. Good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Tamaño normal, hay que comprar una tarjeta SD para poder grabar. Trae una USB que no se sabe para que es (a parte que ya casi ningún computador trae ese puerto). La mayoría de los enchufes vienen para posición vertical y la cámara SOLO FUNCIONA EN HORIZONTAL.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Picture is a little fuzzy, but works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty straightforward version of a nanny-cam except it's disguised as a phone charger adapter. I can see a number of uses for this device: 1) keeping an eye on the babysitter while you're out; 2) keeping an eye on pets while away; or 3) keeping an eye on your motel room while away.You can just plug it in with a mini-sd card and it'l take photos out the box. Or you could pair it with your phone's wifi and monitor from another room. Or you could pair to your router and watch from anywhere in the world.I recommend trying to get the device to an outlet that's as close to chest or eye level as possible. Lower outlets don't give as good a view. Also, if the camera is obscured by a charger cable, it won't capture a clean image. Something to consider.Something else to consider: be sure you're not placing this in areas that aren't legally yours to monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little Charger Spy Cam
reviews.reviewText: When looking at this charger you can kind of tell there's a spy camera in there but then you can't. This is a good thing. You can use this as a nanny cam without anybody really noticing it. The quality is it's better than what you expect. Plus you can record live videos from your phone to keep if anything happens. It lasts just like it says in hours. And there's an indication light and you need an SD card but that's not hard to obtain. This is very good quality for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture quality
reviews.reviewText: This was super easy to set up and use. The picture came out great and the audio sounds really good too. It's small and looks like a charger block so you can't really tell it's a camera. Definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very poor instructions
reviews.reviewText: What use is a great product if the instructions are so hard to read and really incomplete.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very inconspicuous place for a camera.
reviews.reviewText: The USB charger spy camera is a great invention. I like the ease of use and the setup is simple. The camera quality is very good with nice resolution. I would recommend this for the price and the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Cool, Buggy App
reviews.reviewText: This is a very cool product that actually works. You scan the QR code on the paper they give you to download the app and through the app you can connect the spy camera to your phone. The camera is discreet and you wouldn't be able to notice it unless you were super close to it. The only reason this gets a 4 star and not 5 stars is because the app is buggy and would constantly close on me randomly when I was testing out the camera.
